RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. C laiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOOKIN ROYAL broke sharp, inside trip to turn, drew clear stretch, held sway. PELLETIER broke awkward from the gate, off rail run to the turn, mildy. LUCKY US sharp break from inside to the lead, collared turn, stayed third. OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY could not keep up to the turn, weakened in the stretch run. SHEZA HOOT awkward start, threw head from the gate, rushed, gave way quickly.

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break from inside to the lead, collared turn, stayed third

ENTRY.NAME: Lookin Royal
ENTRY.OWNER: Cedar Brick Farm and Huffman Patrick
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, inside trip to turn, drew clear stretch, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Hoot
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Lerios Virginia
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, threw head from the gate, rushed, gave way quickly

ENTRY.NAME: Pelletier
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward from the gate, off rail run to the turn, mildy

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up to the turn, weakened in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 92. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE JANUARY 7, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: D'MONEY HONEY three wide run to turn, went to the lead into stretch, drew clear in the final furlong under good handling. RAF speed from inside to the turn, angled out into the stretch around winner while, no match. BEACH FRONT saved ground to the turn angled out into stretch evenly for third. ARMY SCOUT between horses to the turn, could not keep up in the drive. REVOLUTIONARY ROAD bit awkward start, never factored throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Front
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the turn angled out into stretch evenly for third

ENTRY.NAME: Revolutionary Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit awkward start, never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Raf
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed from inside to the turn, angled out into stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Army Scout
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to the turn, could not keep up in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: D'money Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide run to turn, went to the lead into stretch, went clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED IN 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sin ce Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY BUDDY B up outside to duel early on, glided to the lead to go effortlessly to the wire as tons the best. POLE SETTER chased to pair to the stretch, ran on to get place, best of rest. WHISTLEWHILEYOUMOW dueled winner to the turn, could not keep up weakened for show. ATTA BOY ANTHONY always trailed with no response when needed.

ENTRY.NAME: Atta Boy Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Pole Setter
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to pair to the stretch, ran on to get place, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Whistlewhileyoumow
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled winner to the turn, could not keep up weakened for show

ENTRY.NAME: My Buddy B
ENTRY.COMMENT: up outside to duel early on, glided to the lead, effortlessly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 5F Turf CR: 78. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Hor ses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MENDHAM MILL quick from the gate, settled in to turn, rallied stretch in time. SOMEBODYLOVESYOU chased leader to the stretch, between horses, stayed game to wire. LANALIKESCHOOCHOOS speed to the front from inside stayed on well for show spot. SWEET BABY RAY good position throughout, stayed on gamely in the stretch run. RENAISSANCE (IRE) unhurried to the turn, rallied outside to improve late. BROOKLYNN'S DABOMB between horses to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run. LUCKY SHORE trailed early, improved position only while never a threat. MAMITA LINDA raced along evenly with no response when needed. ROUGH ENOUGH never a menace throughout. SLENDER BETSY through early to trail from the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Lanalikeschoochoos
ENTRY.OWNER: Flower City Racing LLC and Meyer Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front from inside stayed on well for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Rough Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a menace throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Baby Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout, stayed on gamely in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Mamita Linda
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Somebodylovesyou
ENTRY.OWNER: Snowden, Steve, Arnold, Douglas S. and Reed, Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the stretch, between horses, stayed game to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Brooklynn's Dabomb
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Mendham Mill
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick from the gate, settled in to turn, rallied stretch in time

ENTRY.NAME: Renaissance (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, rallied outside to improve late

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Shore
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, improved position only while never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Slender Betsy
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early to trail from the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 55. Allowance Purse 26700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since ThenAllowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA ROSA speed to the front, settled in backstretch, well handled to clear. NEXT GENERATION was unruly during pre load had an awkward from the gate bore out, ran on well thereafter to be best of the rest to the wire. CARLY'S FLIGHT inside trip to far turn shuffled back, rallied to come on for 3rd. STATE OF GRACE raced back while never a real threat. MAYBE FRANKY close up to the half with nothing left from the half, folded. REYS PINA COLADA chased winner to the half inside and dropped far back.

ENTRY.NAME: La Rosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, settled in backstretch, well handled to clear

ENTRY.NAME: State of Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back while never a real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Carly's Flight
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to far turn shuffled back, rallied to come on for 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Maybe Franky
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up to the half with nothing left from the half, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Next Generation
ENTRY.COMMENT: unruly pre load, awkward from gate bore out, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Reys Pina Colada
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the half inside and dropped far back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGH POWERED antsy in gate slow start, raced back made a late run loped clear. CAPPY HOUR off rail trip to chased leaders outside run to the stretch for 2d. MIDNIGHT J J speed to first turn, chased leader to half, took over surrender. NO HANG CHARLIE sharp to the front, led to the half and gave way late going. BRAVO BRAVO never threatened. TORNADO BOY inside trip to no avail while back throughout.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to no avail while back throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INNER HARBOR three wide chase to turn, rallied to go clear late, held sway. I'VE BEEN THINKIN saved ground to stretch, angled out stretch run, finished well. WITCHING HOUR no speed to the turn, rallied inside stretch for show spot. AWESOME VALOR stayed close to the stretch, stayed on in the lane with no kick. CAPTIVE STAR raced along evenly with no late kick in the stretch run. HAPPYSECRET speed to the front, pressured in the stretch, gave in readily. DOGWOODS BECCA never a threat. DARTIGA gave in from the half with little left. WRITTEN CONSENT never menaced.

ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, pressured in the stretch, gave in readily

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONEY PIT never far back to the turn, steady run to leaders and pulled clear in the final seventy yards under good handling. ANDY WALKS WITH ME sharp to the lead stayed to deep stretch, tried hard no match. MONKEY ZONE unhurried to far turn from outside throughout gamely in stretch. GREENSFELDER inside first turn, no room backed up, split horses half, moved up. DOWN TO BIZZNESS no speed throughout, passed tired oned from the turn. WHERE'S LUCKY broke awkwardly from the gate, settled well back and failed to menace throughout while widest into stretch. FRADY pressed leader to the half with nothing left on the rail from the far turn and backed up in the stretch run. THISPOINTINTIME between horses to far turn with no late response. BELL CURVE tried to keep for a half, gave way with little resistance and galloped past the wire and walked off..

ENTRY.NAME: Bell Curve
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep for a half, gave way and galloped past wire

ENTRY.NAME: Andy Walks With Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the lead stayed to deep stretch, tried hard no match

ENTRY.NAME: Thispointintime
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to far turn with no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Greensfelder
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside first turn, no room backed up, split horses half, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Down to Bizzness
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed throughout, passed tired oned from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Where's Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkwardly from the gate while widest into stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Frady
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed leader to the half, nothing left and backed up on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Monkey Zone
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to far turn from outside throughout gamely in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Money Pit
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back to the turn, steady run to leaders pulled clear
